sourcesContent:
<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  name: "RandomCafeButton",
  methods: {
    randomCafe: async function () {
      // this.$emit('randomCafe')
       const a= (await axios.get('http://localhost:8080/api')).data
      a=JSON.parse(a)
      alert(a.data)
    }
  }
}
</script>

<template>
   <button @click="randomCafe" class="random-cafe-btn">
     Выбрать случайное кафе
   </button>
</template>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.random-cafe-btn {
  width: 200px;
  display: block;
  margin: 0 auto 20px;
  background-color: #FFF;
  padding: 10px 32px;
  border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
  font-size: 26px;
  outline: 0;
  transition: all 0.3s;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: 'Caveat', cursive;

  &:hover {
    box-shadow: 0 5px 7px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  }

  &:active {
    position: relative;
    top: 1px;
  }
}
</style>
